verses.verse: In Thee, O Lord,<WH3068> I have taken<WH2620> refuge;<WH2620> Let me never<WH408> <WH5769> be ashamed.<WH954>
In Thy righteousness<WH6666> deliver<WH5337> me, and rescue<WH6403> me; Incline<WH5186> Thine ear<WH241> to me, and save<WH3467> me.

Be Thou to me a rock<WH6697> of habitation,<WH4583> to which I may continually<WH8548> come;<WH935> Thou hast given<WH6680> commandment<WH6680> to save<WH3467> me, For Thou art my rock<WH5553> and my fortress.<WH4686>
Rescue<WH6403> me, O my God,<WH430> out of the hand<WH3027> of the wicked,<WH7563> Out of the grasp<WH3709> of the wrongdoer<WH5765> and ruthless<WH9145> man,<WH9145>
For Thou art my hope;<WH8615> O Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> [Thou art] my confidence<WH4009> from my youth.<WH5271>
By Thee I have been sustained<WH5564> from [my] birth;<WH990> Thou art He who took<WH1491> me from my mother's womb;<WH990> My praise<WH8416> is continually<WH8548> of Thee.
I have become<WH1961> a marvel<WH4159> to many;<WH7227> For Thou art my strong<WH5797> refuge.<WH4268>
My mouth<WH6310> is filled<WH4390> with Thy praise,<WH8416> And with Thy glory<WH8597> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long.
Do not cast<WH7993> me off<WH7993> in the time<WH6256> of old<WH2209> age;<WH2209> Do not forsake<WH5800> me when my strength<WH3581> fails.<WH3615>
For my enemies<WH340> have spoken<WH559> against me; And those who watch<WH8104> for my life<WH5315> have consulted<WH3289> together,<WH9191>
Saying,<WH559> "God<WH430> has forsaken<WH5800> him; Pursue<WH7291> and seize<WH8610> him, for there<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> to deliver.<WH5337>"
O God,<WH430> do not be far<WH7368> from me; O my God,<WH430> hasten<WH2363> to my help!<WH5833>

Let those who are adversaries<WH7853> of my soul<WH5315> be ashamed<WH954> [and] consumed;<WH3615> Let them be covered<WH5844> with reproach<WH2781> and dishonor,<WH3639> who seek<WH1245> to injure<WH9567> me.
But as for me, I will hope<WH3176> continually,<WH8548> And will praise<WH8416> Thee yet<WH3254> more<WH3254> and more.<WH3254>
My mouth<WH6310> shall tell<WH5608> of Thy righteousness,<WH6666> [And] of Thy salvation<WH8668> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long; For I do not know<WH3045> the sum<WH5615> [of them.]
I will come<WH935> with the mighty<WH1369> deeds<WH1369> of the Lord<WH136> God;<WH3068> I will make<WH2142> mention<WH2142> of Thy righteousness,<WH6666> Thine alone.<WH905>
O God,<WH430> Thou hast taught<WH3925> me from my youth;<WH5271> And I still<WH5704> <WH2008> declare<WH5046> Thy wondrous<WH6381> deeds.<WH6381>

And even<WH1571> when<WH5704> [I am] old<WH2209> and gray,<WH7872> O God,<WH430> do not forsake<WH5800> me, Until<WH5704> I declare<WH5046> Thy strength<WH2220> to [this] generation,<WH1755> Thy power<WH1369> to all<WH3605> who are to come.<WH935>
For Thy righteousness,<WH6666> O God,<WH430> [reaches] to the heavens,<WH4791> Thou who<WH834> hast done<WH6213> great<WH1419> things;<WH1419> O God,<WH430> who<WH4310> is like<WH3644> Thee?

Thou, who<WH834> hast shown<WH7200> me many<WH7227> troubles<WH6869> and distresses,<WH9567> Wilt revive<WH2421> me again,<WH7725> And wilt bring<WH5927> me up again<WH7725> from the depths<WH8415> of the earth.<WH776>
Mayest Thou increase<WH7235> my greatness,<WH1420> And turn<WH5437> [to] comfort<WH5162> me.

I will also<WH1571> praise<WH3034> Thee with a harp,<WH5035> [Even] Thy truth,<WH571> O my God;<WH430> To Thee I will sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> with the lyre,<WH3658> O Thou Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>
My lips<WH8193> will shout<WH7442> for joy<WH7442> when<WH3588> I sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> to Thee; And my soul,<WH5315> which<WH834> Thou hast redeemed.<WH6299>

My tongue<WH3956> also<WH1571> will utter<WH1897> Thy righteousness<WH6666> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long; For they are ashamed,<WH954> for they are humiliated<WH2659> who seek<WH1245> my hurt.<WH9567>
